sections.heading: to 29-7A-7 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 2003, ch. 320, § 12 repealed 29-7A-1 to 29-7A-7 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1979, ch. 228, relating to the Radio Dispatcher Training Program, effective July 1, 2003. For provisions of former section,seethe 2002 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For the Public Safety Telecommunicator Training Act,see29-7C-1 NMSA 1978 et seq.
